SEARCH
程序包 model

类 Network

java.lang.Object
model.Network
public class Network extends Object
The Network class handles the network communication for the Battleship game. It manages sending and receiving messages between the host and client, and processes game-related messages.

  • 构造器概要

    Constructor for the Network class.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Network

      public Network(Socket socket, GameUi gameUi, Game game, Controller controller, boolean isHost) throws IOException
      Constructor for the Network class. Initializes the network communication with the specified socket, game UI, game logic, and controller.
      参数:
      socket - the network socket
      gameUi - the GameUi instance
      game - the Game instance
      controller - the Controller instance
      isHost - true if this instance represents the host, false if it represents the client
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when setting up the network streams

  • 方法详细资料

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to the connected peer.
      参数:
      message - the message to send

    • receiveMessage

      public String receiveMessage() throws IOException
      Receives a message from the connected peer.
      返回:
      the received message
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when reading the message

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes the network connection and releases resources.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing the network streams or socket

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the network and resets the game UI and game logic.

    • setHostReady

      public void setHostReady(boolean isHostReady)
      Sets the host ready status.
      参数:
      isHostReady - true if the host is ready, false otherwise

    • setClientReady

      public void setClientReady(boolean isClientReady)
      Sets the client ready status.
      参数:
      isClientReady - true if the client is ready, false otherwise

    • checkBothReady

      public void checkBothReady()
      Checks if both host and client are ready, and starts the game if they are.
